channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Nvidia in 2025: year in review
item.description: AI profits hit new heights, but it's been something of a rollercoaster for Nvidia this year with its new generation of Blackwell GPUs.

item.title: Amazon fait −63 % sur le chargeur rapide Xiaomi 120 W qui détecte vos appareils et adapte la puissance automatiquement
item.description: Avec le Xiaomi 120W Hypercharge Combo Type-A vous allez vite retrouver de l'autonomie sur vos appareils, surtout qu'il est en promo à 25,69 euros au lieu de 69,99 euros.

item.title: Commodore 64 Ultimate Review: An Astonishing Remake
item.description: The reborn Commodore 64 is an astonishing remake—but daunting if you weren’t there the first time around.

item.title: The Morning After: What to expect at CES 2026
item.description: CES 2026 is right around the corner, and the pre-show hype cycle/ early reveals suggest, yes, there’s going to be an awful lot of AI-powered insert-product-category-here alongside, thankfully, some major announcements from the likes of Intel, Sony and NVIDIA. Intel is finally unveiling its Panther Lake (Core Ultra Series 3) chips. The first chips built on Intel’s 2nm process could offer a 50 percent performance boost, which is sorely needed amid intense competition. NVIDIA’s Jensen Huang is taking the stage for a keynote expected to feature a lot of AI hype, while AMD’s Lisa Su will likely cou...

item.title: Pour la première fois, un avion a été posé en urgence sans intervention humaine directe
item.description: Poser un avion de façon autonome avec son système de pilotage automatique est courant. Mais dans le cas de ce Beechcraft Super King Air dont la cabine était dépressurisée, c’est la première fois qu’un tel système est utilisé pour atterrir en urgence.

item.title: Thousands of servers exposed as MongoBleed vulnerability exploited
item.description: A proof-of-concept is now available on the internet, and around 87,000 servers are at risk.

item.title: Gizmodo’s Guide to the Coolest Space Missions of 2026
item.description: Mark your calendars.

item.title: What Is a Preamp, and Do I Really Need One?
item.description: If you've wondered what a preamplifier is, what it exactly does, and whether your audio setup is missing one, we've got the answers—as well as some of our top recommendations.

item.title: This Disney+, Hulu and ESPN bundle deal is too good to pass up – here are 3 shows I recommend streaming first
item.description: From superheroes to aliens, here's what to stream first with the Disney+, Hulu and ESPN discount deal.

item.title: The 5 weirdest brand partnerships from 2025 prove collabs have lost the plot
item.description: Hint: ketchup luggage, ‘Stranger Things’ soap, and hot sauce energy drinks ahead. Ketchup-inspired luggage. Soap based on the characters from Stranger Things. A hot sauce energy drink. These are just a few of the brand collaborations that we’ve seen in 2025—and it’s safe to say that all’s not well in the world of brand partnerships.

item.title: 7 CEOs share their New Year’s resolutions
item.description: These chief executives are creating New Year’s resolutions to push themselves and their companies in 2026. Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....

item.title: 7 Best Digital Notebooks (2026): reMarkable, Kobo, Kindle
item.description: These nifty tools combine the ease of jotting notes by hand with the power of saving them digitally.

item.title: Retour vers le futur : la console Atari 2600+ comprenant 10 jeux est à -42 % et est compatible avec les cartouches de l’époque
item.description: Atari a décidé de ressusciter sa console phare des années 70 : l'Atari 2600+ est disponible sur Amazon pour 86,51 euros au lieu de 149,99 euros. L'Atari 7800+ est aussi en promo à 102,35 euros au lieu de 149,99 euros.

item.title: Galaxy S26 Ultra : Samsung aurait enfin corrigé ces défauts bien connus de l’appareil photo
item.description: On pensait avoir déjà bien cerné le futur Galaxy S26 Ultra, mais Samsung pourrait bien avoir gardé quelques surprises dans sa manche concernant le rendu photo.

item.title: Faire tenir une grosse batterie de PC dans un smartphone : ce serait le projet de Samsung
item.description: De nouvelles informations suggèrent que Samsung travaillerait au développement d'une batterie compacte de 20 000 mAh vouée à de futures générations de smartphones. Cette capacité XXL permettrait de monter très sérieusement en gamme côté autonomie.

item.title: Les meilleurs smartphones Realme : quel modèle choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: Relativement jeune, la marque Realme rencontrait un franc succès avec ses smartphones abordables. La croissance florissante du constructeur est désormais freinée dans son élan en Europe. On vous explique la gamme et on vous conseille les meilleurs smartphones Realme du moment.

item.title: Vous avez une TV LG ? Cette nouvelle application transforme votre smartphone en manette de jeu
item.description: Le Portail Gaming de LG dévoile de nouvelles manières de jouer sur sa plateforme de jeux vidéo en streaming.

item.title: The Great Big Power Play
item.description: US support for nuclear energy is soaring. Meanwhile, coal plants are on their way out and electricity-sucking data centers are meeting huge pushback. Welcome to the next front in the energy battle.

item.title: Tips for Keeping a Digital Diary and Why You Should
item.description: After 10 years of journaling, my only regret is not starting sooner.

item.title: 5 big problems with Windows 11 that I really hope Microsoft fixes in 2026
item.description: If Microsoft follows this five-point action plan, I can absolutely guarantee a much happier Windows 11 user base.

item.title: Tomorrow, the MTA will stop selling MetroCards. Good riddance
item.description: After 30 years of glitchy swiping, it’s finally time for New Yorkers to get the subway experience that they deserve. My bus rolls into Port Authority. I’ve got 10 minutes to get across town for my first meeting. I sprint down the escalator, run through droves of people, and arrive at a subway turnstile. I swipe my MetroCard through the magnetic reader, step forward—only to get crotch-checked by a locked metal bar and flipped the finger by a screen that displays “PLEASE SWIPE AGAIN.” I give it another swipe. “INSUFFICIENT FARE.”...

item.title: How I turned ADHD and anxiety into a successful wellness company
item.description: Rather than letting anxiety be an enemy, I fueled it to build a company that generated over $160M ARR. I started building Simple in 2019 with a vision that one day, a digital product could help people fix their health as effectively as a human. Five years later, we turned this vision into a company with 160M in ARR, and a team of more than 150 people across multiple countries....
